metadata.Title: CVE-2010-4337 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description:
The configure script in gnash 0.8.8 allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on the (1) /tmp/gnash-configure-errors.$$, (2) /tmp/gnash-configure-warnings.$$, or (3) /tmp/gnash-configure-recommended.$$ files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2010-4337` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

browser-plugin-gnash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-common - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-common-opengl - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-cygnal - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-ext-fileio - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-ext-lirc - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-ext-mysql - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-opengl - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
gnash-tools - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
klash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
klash-opengl - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
konqueror-plugin-gnash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
mozilla-plugin-gnash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
python-gtk-gnash - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
swfdec-mozilla - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

swfdec-gnome - 0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gnash package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.8.11~git20130903-3ubuntu1').
